# amount

**Instance Property**

The amount to authorize for the payment token context.

## Declaration

```swift
required DOMString amount;
```

## Discussion

The sum of the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentTokenContext/amount] of all the payment token contexts in a payment request must be less than or equal to the grand total amount of the enclosing payment request.
